citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
At the time of this inspection I was informed that this facility's attending vet had recently passed away. The veterinary
practice had closed. Therefore, this facility no longer had a valid Program of Vet Care. This licensee will need to hire an
attending vet and have them complete the Program of Veterinary care as it pertains to this animal.
***To Be Corrected By: Aug 27, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
At the time of this inspection I was informed that this facility's attending vet had recently passed away. The veterinary 
practice had closed. Therefore, this facility no longer had a valid Program of Vet Care. This licensee will need to hire an 
attending vet and have them complete the Program of Veterinary care as it pertains to this animal. 
***To Be Corrected By: Aug 27, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
